rows.label: qst701107_msg0001
rows.name:
Would you look at that!
Thanks to your help, we've got
ourselves a ship!

rows.label: qst701107_msg0002
rows.name: Wow, no kidding! She's a beauty!

rows.label: qst701107_msg0003
rows.name:
Ahahah...
'Course she is! Made her myself, I did!

rows.label: qst701107_msg0004
rows.name:
Though there's still a few bits I'd like to
polish up, seeing as how I made her in a
bit of a hurry...

rows.label: qst701107_msg0005
rows.name:
Well now!
She's much grander than I'd expected!

rows.label: qst701107_msg0006
rows.name: Oh, there's Maquia-san.

rows.label: qst701107_msg0007
rows.name:
Allow me to introduce you!
This is your new helmswoman, Ma...

rows.label: qst701107_msg0008
rows.name:
Whaaaaaaaat?!
You?! Helmswoman?!

rows.label: qst701107_msg0009
rows.name:
Hey there, sonny boy. ♪
Still skint as a badger, I see.

rows.label: qst701107_msg0010
rows.name: You know each other?

rows.label: qst701107_msg0011
rows.name:
Know each other? She used to sponge
off of my master's charity once upon a
time. Since then we...keep meeting...

rows.label: qst701107_msg0012
rows.name:
....Well, anyhow, she's a great smuggler.
She'll get anything, anywhere... Though
obviously for a considerable fee.

rows.label: qst701107_msg0013
rows.name:
Mind not painting me like I'm some
miserly gold-digger, dear? Your master
asked me to work with you, so be civil.

rows.label: qst701107_msg0014
rows.name:
And so, to business. What're we to be
smuggling today? Weapons? Bullion?

rows.label: qst701107_msg0015
rows.name:
I've got a policy against carrying
monsters, just so you're aware.
They just make so much racket...

rows.label: qst701107_msg0016
rows.name: Stop being daft! It's people, OK?

rows.label: qst701107_msg0017
rows.name:
The fighting's reached our shores, so I
want to be ready to help evacuate the
townsfolk when the time comes.

rows.label: qst701107_msg0018
rows.name:
Obviously this one boat isn't enough,
but even one's a start. I'll try to make
more later, as well.

rows.label: qst701107_msg0019
rows.name:
Hrmph. So you'll run like a scared rat,
and leave Iira to sink?

rows.label: qst701107_msg0020
rows.name:
You don't get it! So long as Iirans
survive, wherever they settle again will
be home enough!

rows.label: qst701107_msg0021
rows.name:
Heh... OK then. So what we're actually
smuggling is a nation? Really now,
sonny boy?

rows.label: qst701107_msg0022
rows.name:
...Ah, you know what, I like the cut of
your jib! Very good, I'll pitch in with
your venture. ♪

rows.label: qst701107_msg0023
rows.name:
Right then, let's see what we're
working with...

rows.label: qst701107_msg0024
rows.name:
I see... So Wotta's been building boats
to help his countrymen.

rows.label: qst701107_msg0025
rows.name:
Don't give me too much credit.
I just want to do whatever I can,
that's all...

rows.label: qst701107_msg0026
rows.name:
The way I see it, there's only so much
leaders can do in a crisis. If we wait for
them to act, help might come too late.

rows.label: qst701107_msg0027
rows.name:
...I think you're too humble. Not many
people would take it upon themselves
to put a plan like this into action.

rows.label: qst701107_msg0028
rows.name:
Well, gosh... Thanks!
I think the key thing is that you can't
wait for a perfect solution.

rows.label: qst701107_msg0029
rows.name: Or you might end up waiting forever!

rows.label: qst701107_msg0030
rows.name:
I cannot tell if he's a visionary, or
simply somewhat deluded...

rows.label: qst701107_msg0031
rows.name:
I just think if you keep at it, then
eventually you'll get there. You just
have to believe in yourself!

rows.label: qst701107_msg0032
rows.name:
So it's all about the
self-confidence, huh...?

rows.label: qst701107_msg0033
rows.name:
Whoa! Check it out Sata!
He really made a brand-new boat!

rows.label: qst701107_msg0034
rows.name: Aren't you glad we came?

rows.label: qst701107_msg0036
rows.name:
Wow, you're staring at it like you
wanna stare a hole through it..
You like ships and stuff, Sata?

rows.label: qst701107_msg0037
rows.name:
You do, don't you?
It's cool that you have something
you love that much!

rows.label: qst701107_msg0038
rows.name:
But for now we've got our mission!
That's right - we gotta get back to
the shopping! C'mon!

rows.label: qst701107_msg0039
rows.name:
Oi, c'mon now! If Hikari finds out
we've snuck off again, she'll never
shut up about it.

rows.label: qst701107_msg0040
rows.name: We'll come back again later, OK?
